subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] amys back
author: Vicki Talbott
full_text:
--0-415504851-1154716892=:44412
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hi Frank,
  I've been following this debunker thread.  I really can't think of anything at all that would convince them.  When they have such a mind set, even if they sat right there in front of you and heard it as a Class A directly on playback, they would have a justification for it not being EVP.  We know what you are doing is real, and people like Gary Schwartz from the University of Arizona knows what we are experiencing is what we say it is, so I say let the debunkers have their say and ignore them.  It takes all kinds.  Good work you've been doing Frank.   Keep it up.  Vicki

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
               Well, I think I found a way to at least show my voices are not contrived, at leas to people that accept the concept of EVP. I�m using the reverse component to show that the voices are impossible to manufacture. To the debunkers though, no evidence is acceptable, so this won�t matter. There are people that have sites, like haunted voices teat even say I fake the voices, so that�s what I�m trying combat. 
  
  
   Frank
